item.title: Factfulness
item.description: While browsing the web around data visualization, someone recommended Hans Rosling’s TED talk. You must watch the video if you like visualization or you like listening to story. While learning about him, I came across this book Factfulness. Book Name Author Subject Area Pages Factfulness: Ten reasons we’re wrong about the world Hans Rosling Data-based thinking 342 About author Hans Rosling was a Swedish physician, academic, and public speaker.
